A Cyber Event Simulation: Are You Prepared?

 

 

 

Here are some key highlights you can look forward to during the webinar:

 

*	A practical walkthrough of the stages of a ransomware attack.

 

*	Crisis management actions for early response and mitigation.

 

*	Understanding the legal, regulatory, and reputational aspects of a cyberattack.

 

This webinar is restricted solely to invited participants.

 

	

 

REGISTER NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fevent.eu.on24.com%2Fwcc%2Fr%2F8000098814%2FB8A885E662CB560FCAFBE8EBF65E2CC7%3Fpartnerref%3DAGClientsKAB&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C83ec8e0fa36a4f1bcd3408dce844c4ed%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638640629312332024%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=MhfLnBkF6UHhFeHf7wVtZ3BWvG%2Bl2PHB5rQf4pJookU%3D&reserved=0>
